sentences.english: Eight salute to heaven and earth, let the heavens and the earth for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 八门礼炮告天地，同心同德天地久。

sentences.english: Let us, then, fellow-citizens, unite with one heart and one mind.
sentences.chinese: 因此，公民们，让我们同心同德地团结起来。

sentences.english: Drums, the most progressive and concerted efforts will inspire innovation.
sentences.chinese: 鼓，最能激励创新奋进与同心同德。

sentences.english: I thanked them for sticking with us during these bad times.
sentences.chinese: 我感谢他们在这些困难的时期和我们同心同德。

sentences.english: Let us, fellow-citizens, unite with one heart and one mind.
sentences.chinese: 同胞们，让我们同心同德团结起来。

sentences.english: Customers First, One Heart AND one Soul, Persistence in Technical innovation.
sentences.chinese: 以顾客为中心，同心同德，坚持技术创新。

sentences.english: The group of be of one heart and one mind, build gravity, comprehensively promote the shareholding system reform.
sentences.chinese: 现集团上下同心同德，重力打造，全面推进股改上市。

to be of one mind/to think or act alike
to twist together to form a rope/(fig.) to unite/to work together
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
hand in hand and shoulder to shoulder
unity of will is an impregnable stronghold (idiom)
to work as one (idiom); united in a concerted effort/working hard together
to share joys and sorrows/sharing good times and hard times/same as 同甘共苦
Tongxin county in Wuzhong 吳忠|吴忠[Wu2 zhong1], Ningxia
to be of one mind/united/concentric
to keep watch and defend one another (idiom, from Mencius); to join forces to defend against external aggressors/mutual help and protection
to unite/unity/solidarity/united
millions of people all of one mind (idiom); the people united
